impact_stories.title: Youth Devolution Festival
impact_stories.subtitle: Youth Devolution Festival
impact_stories.description: KYWP organized the 2nd Youth Devolution Festival, engaging 500+ youth leaders in policy advocacy, skill development, and community engagement. The festival aimed to raise awareness on youth empowerment, promote sustainable development, and build a network of youth leaders for positive change.

impact_stories.title: Kisumu Central NG-CDF project proposal
impact_stories.subtitle: Digital Advocacy
impact_stories.description: KYWP submitted a proposal for the Kisumu Central NG-CDF project, focusing on water and sanitation infrastructure development, training 100+ youth in construction and maintenance skills, and engaging local communities in project implementation. The project aimed to improve access to clean water and sanitation facilities, enhance community hygiene, and promote sustainable development.
images: Kisumu Central NG-CDF project proposal-20250514T070042Z-1-001/Kisumu Central NG-CDF project proposal/487468620_122234537966223163_8338343999752817308_n.jpg

impact_stories.title: Kajulu Forest Restoration
impact_stories.subtitle: Forest Restoration
impact_stories.description: Restoring 50 hectares of degraded forest land. 2,000+ trees planted, creating sustainable livelihoods for local youth.

impact_stories.title: International Day of Peace
impact_stories.subtitle: Peace Day
impact_stories.description: Engaging 500+ youth in peace-building activities focused on water resource management and conflict resolution.

impact_stories.title: Fish Fiesta Collaboration
impact_stories.subtitle: Fish Fiesta
impact_stories.description: Educating 200+ fishermen about sustainable practices, reducing destructive fishing by 30% in targeted areas.

impact_stories.title: KWAHO Collaboration
impact_stories.subtitle: KWAHO Collaboration
impact_stories.description: Implementing rainwater harvesting in 15 schools, training 100+ youth leaders in water management.
images: KWAHO Courtesy Call-20250514T070147Z-1-001/KEWASNET- KWAHO Courtesy Call/20241004_140211.jpg

impact_stories.title: Kibos WASH School Outreach
impact_stories.subtitle: Kibos WASH School Outreach
impact_stories.description: KYWP partnered with the Kibos Water and Sanitation Network (KEWASNET) to implement a WASH school outreach program. The initiative reached over 1,000 students, providing hygiene education, installing handwashing facilities, and training teachers on water and sanitation best practices. This program enhanced hygiene practices and reduced waterborne illnesses.
images: Kibos WASH School Outreach-20250514T070053Z-1-001/Kibos WASH School Outreach/pic5.jpg

impact_stories.title: Youth Innovation Summit
impact_stories.subtitle: Youth Innovation Summit
impact_stories.description: KYWP convened the National Youth Climate Change and Water Security Innovation Summit to empower young people to develop innovative solutions addressing climate resilience and water security. The summit brought together youth leaders, innovators, policymakers, and experts to share ideas, showcase climate-smart technologies, and foster collaboration towards sustainable water and climate action.
images: National Youth Climate Change and Water Security Innovation Summit-20250514T073446Z-1-001/National Youth Climate Change and Water Security Innovation Summit/pic2.jpg

impact_stories.title: LREB Water Conference 2024
impact_stories.subtitle: LREB Water Conference 2024
impact_stories.description: KYWP convened the LREB Water Conference 2024 to address water challenges and promote sustainable water management. The conference featured expert speakers, interactive sessions, and networking opportunities, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing to improve water security and resource management.

impact_stories.title: International Day of Peace
impact_stories.subtitle: Peace-Building through Water Management
impact_stories.description: Engaging 500+ youth in peace-building activities focused on water resource management and conflict resolution.

impact_stories.title: Partnerships and collaboration
impact_stories.subtitle: Strengthening WASH Collaboration at the Benchmarking Forum in Lusaka
impact_stories.description: We were honored to participate in the WASH Benchmarking Forum in Lusaka, Zambia, represented by Adwet Mc'Omondi. This forum provided a platform for sharing expertise, fostering innovation, and building partnerships for sustainable water, sanitation, and hygiene solutions. Collaborations like these drive impactful change in communities, ensuring access to safe water and improved sanitation for all.
